CustomField.formula: OR( CONTAINS( Geography__c , "China" ) , CONTAINS( Geography__c , "Japan" ) , CONTAINS( Geography__c , "Korea" ) , CONTAINS( Geography__c , "Australia" ) , CONTAINS( Geography__c , "SE Asia" ) , CONTAINS( Geography__c , "India" ), CONTAINS( Groupings__c , "China" ) , CONTAINS( Groupings__c , "Japan" ) , CONTAINS( Groupings__c , "Korea" ) , CONTAINS( Groupings__c , "Australia" ) , CONTAINS( Groupings__c , "SE Asia" ) , CONTAINS( Groupings__c , "India" ) )
CustomField.label: Is Asia Deal
